document.text:
From: 
S)' 
Subject: DRAFT SDNY PRESS GUIDANCE FOR MONDAY, JULY 15, 2019 
Date: Fri, 12 Jul 2019 20:37:19 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Attachments: Jeffrey_Epstein_indictment_PR.pdf 
Inline-Images: image001.png 
Chiefs, 
EFTA00015348

Below is Monday's draft guidance. Please review and let us know if  we need to make 
any edits. 
Thanks—and have a great weekend!! 
The Press Office 
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY'S OFFICE 
Southern District of New 
York 
PRESS GUIDANCE 
Monday, July 15, 2019 
PROCEEDINGS AND EVENTS 
10:00 a.m. —  Detention hearing in U.S. v. Jeffrey Epstein —  the defendant is charged with sex trafficking of 
minors and conspiracy to commit sex trafficking of minors —  before Judge Berman (courtroom 17B, 500 Pearl 
Street). A relevant press release is attached. 
NIGHT DUTY OFFICER 
Follow us on Facebook I Follow us on Twitter I SDNY website I YouTube 
*** FOR PLANNING PURPOSES ONLY *** 
DO NOT REPLY TO THIS MESSAGE. IF YOU HAVE UESTIONS, PLEASE CALL THE PRESS 
OFFICE A 
EFTA00015349
